attributes.comment:
Please do not raise the fees on the I-171H and the fingerprinting. The cost of
international adoption is already very high and for those of us adopting from China,
we have to pay these fees twice due to the length of time. (It would also be nice if
we could get a free renewal since it's not our fault the process takes so long).

It would be a shame for people to give up on the thought of international adoption
because it is cost-prohibitive.

This policy affects real people with real babies waiting. It is also real money that
comes out of our pockets.

Thank you for considering not raising the fees. It would mean a lot to thousands of
families.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Clint R. Redwine
